Affirmations

I release all anxiety and embrace calmness and peace.

I am capable of managing my thoughts and feelings, and I choose to focus on positivity and joy.

My mind is clear and calm, and I am in control of my emotions.

I am worthy of love, happiness, and inner peace.

I choose to let go of stress and welcome tranquility into my life.

I am surrounded by positive energy that uplifts and supports me.

Each breath I take fills me with calmness and serenity.
